document.full_text: australian prime minister julia gillard's labor party looks set to suffer a big defeat on saturday in elections in the nation's most populous state, leaving three out of six states under labor as she tries to bring in a national carbon price and mining tax.
document.title: australia's ruling labor headed for state election "bloodbath"
lines_and_colors: australian prime minister julia gillard's labor party looks set to suffer a big defeat on saturday in elections in the nation's most populous state, leaving three out of six states under labor as she tries to bring in a national carbon price and mining tax.
